channel.title: Clagnut summaries
channel.description: A blog by Richard Rutter. Root through a heap of web design and development stuff and a few other tasty morsels. (latest 10 posts in summary)

item.title: How to typeset a date range properly
item.description: How to typeset a date range properly Read more.

item.title: How to subset a variable font
item.description: Professional fonts can contain a lot characters you will never use, increasing file size uncessarily. These characters can be removed by subsetting a font. This post explains how to subset fonts from first principles on a Mac using fonttools. Read more.

item.title: Top Tunes 2021
item.description: Here’s a playlist of favourite songs I bought this year. Not quite a record-breaking haul, but a floor full of vinyl none-the-less. A mixture of new, not so new, and old; and some real corkers in amongst them. Read more.

item.title: One year on and what next for remote working?
item.description: Since the UK locked down 52 weeks ago, Clearleft folks have been working fully remotely. As the vaccine works its magic, in a few months time weâ€™ll be able to move back into our studio. What happens then? Read more.

item.title: Top Tunes 2020
item.description: Here’s a playlist of favourite songs I bought this year. Not quite a record-breaking haul, but a floor full of vinyl none-the-less. A mixture of new, not so new, and old; and some real corkers in amongst them. Read more.

item.title: Shining a light on Neon
item.description: Design by Clearleft on behalf of EngineeringUK, Neon breaks down stereotypes about engineering careers through inspirational case studies and experiences. A cause close to my heart, as a former engineer. Read more.

item.title: The best compostable Nespresso capsules
item.description: Searching for a rich, bold, chocolatey Nespresso coffee, ethically sourced, and home-compostable pods, I tried 17 different coffees from 5 different brands until finally I came across two which hit the mark. Read more.

item.title: Top Tunes 2017
item.description: Iâ€™ve been back filling my best ofs, so hereâ€™s a compilation of favourite songs I bought in 2017. It was the start of a sequence of excellent music-buying years. Read more.

item.title: Top Tunes 2019
item.description: Hereâ€™s a compilation of favourite songs I bought this year, and another damn fine year it was too. Read more.

item.title: JOGLE Day 12 – Liskeard to Land’s End
item.description: Day 12, the final day of our ride from John o’Groats, took us from Liskeard to Land’s End. We made it. What a trip. Read more.
